1. Search toggle (continued): The search toggle button is wrapped inside a `
` with the class `.search-toggle`. When users click on the button, it toggles the visibility of the search form located inside the `#search-container` div. ```html
Search
``` 1. Search form: The search form in Twenty Fourteen is contained within a separate `
` with the ID `#search-container` and the class `.search-box-wrapper`. This structure allows for better management and styling of the search form, as well as improved interaction with the search toggle button. The form is initially hidden with the class `.hide` and becomes visible when the search toggle button is clicked. ```html
``` 1. Primary navigation: The primary navigation in Twenty Fourteen is simplified compared to Twenty Thirteen. It is placed directly inside the `
` element with an ID of `#primary-navigation`. This change streamlines the navigation structure and makes it easier to customize. ```html
``` In summary, the header markup of the Twenty Fourteen theme has been restructured and refined compared to Twenty Thirteen. The changes include a new header layout with improved organization, simplified site title markup, the addition of a search toggle button, a separate search form container, and a streamlined primary navigation structure. These modifications aim to enhance the user experience, improve design aesthetics, and simplify customization for developers and website owners.
